request.description: Permission Group List, Where you can all the groups of permission super-admin can add

List of User for the admin and super admin.
- parameter - status
    - permit : allow user to verify there details to access bullion.
        - too show the list of permit user their details should be totalled filled and is_detail in user model and company_branch model should be true.
    - admin : to get only admin user
    - seller : to get all ther sellere who has permitted to access bullion
    - user : Other than admin and bullion user 
    - deleted : All deleted user.
- parameter - search 
    - you can search the names of the user and their exact phone number. Any one field.
Admin Registration when superadmin is logged in
- Admin Details Page after passing Admin id

- Admin Details Page after passing Admin id

parameter 
- profile : Fields are same as that of admin create rather than the password fields.
- fields      
            "name": "Admi-1",
            "email": "admin@gmail.com",
            "mobile_no": "1111",
            "city": "Bangalore",
            "state": "MP",
            "country": "India"

- status : Fields are group_id and the is_Active.
    - fields
            "is_active" : "abc",
            "groups_id" : [1]

Please make sure you don't pass is_active status in the profile parameter
- Admin Details Page after passing Admin id

If check whether the user is verified or not 
- Is verified == True :
    - Dont allow user to edit the phone number, send the response as email and password(if he wants to change).

- If not :
    - He has access to change his email mobile number and password(if required)
